```{r}
library(pdftools)
library(magick)

## convert pdf's to png's
setwd(here::here("dev"))
pdfs <- list.files(here::here("dev"), pattern = "2020_.*pdf")

for(pdf in pdfs) {
  pdf_convert(pdf = here::here("dev", pdf), 
              format = "png", dpi = 150)
}

system("magick.exe convert 2020_*.png -resize 1000x1200 -gravity center -background black -extent 1000x1200 out-%03d.png")


## convert png's to gif
system("magick.exe -delay 20 out*.png -delay 500 out-251.png -loop 0 2020_31_PalmerPenguins.gif")
```
